channel.title: Office 365 Cli on Baywet's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Office 365 Cli on Baywet's blog

item.title: Recording available PnP Call December 5th - Office 365 CLI externalize
item.description:
I was invited to demonstrate the new Office 365 CLI externalize command during on the of recent PnP calls.

You can watch the full call here

As a reminder this new command allows you to scan a SPFx project and get the external configuration automatically. Doing this reduces greatly the size of your solutions, improving performances for end users.

You can watch the command in action belowÂ and read the documentation here.
